AHRIMAN.KEYWORDS: Infantry, Character, Epic Hero, Psyker, Chaos, Tzeentch, Ahriman

ABILITIES.Rubric Lord: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.
ABILITIES.Arch-Sorcerer of Tzeentch (Psychic): Once per battle, you can select this model to use a Ritual for 0 Cabal points (see Cabal of Sorcerers). If you do, all the other rules for using Rituals still apply.

AHRIMAN ON DISC OF TZEENTCH.KEYWORDS: Infantry, Character, Epic Hero, Psyker, Fly, Chaos, Tzeentch, Ahriman on Disc of Tzeentch

ABILITIES.Rubric Lord: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.
ABILITIES.Arch-Sorcerer of Tzeentch (Psychic): Once per battle, you can select this model to use a Ritual for 0 Cabal points (see Cabal of Sorcerers). If you do, all the other rules for using Rituals still apply.
